attributes.action: remind us exactly when and how he was voted in as Prime Minister by the British Public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As above.

For better or worse, the British public spoke at a general election in May 2005 and the Labour party was elected to government, albeit with "the lowest share of the vote for a ruling party in modern times"[1].

As an eligible voter in this so-called Democracy, I am unable to recollect exactly when I was asked to express my opinion. I'd be interested to see if our enlightened leader could remind me.









[1] Source:
BBC News website, political news, May 2005
